#summary Release Notes of VirtualMIPS V0.06.

I am glad to release VirtualMIPS version 0.06. The most important changes in this release include: 
  * JIT support of X86 host
  * code cleanup
  * fix issue [http://code.google.com/p/virtualmips/issues/detail?id=3 3] and [http://code.google.com/p/virtualmips/issues/detail?id=4 4]

See [status current Status] for more information.
